channel.title: tutorial on blag
channel.description: Recent content in tutorial on blag

item.title: When is my Cake Day?
item.description: Using praw and prawoauth2 to find when is my cake day on Reddit.

item.title: How I Am Maintaining Multiple Emails For Git On A Same Machine
item.description: In this simple tutorial I will show how to maintain multiple git emails on a same machine. And how to configure git emails per directory or per project.

item.title: Flashing Asus-WRT Merlin by XVortex on NetGear NightHawk R7000
item.description: This tutorial will explain you how to flash Asus-WRT Merlin by XVortex on NetGear NightHawk R7000.

item.title: Install Windows 8 UEFI on Legacy BIOS with Clover (and Dual boot with Yosemite)
item.description: This tutorial will help you install Windows 8 on a Legacy BIOS in UEFI mode using Clover and dual boot with Yosemite.

item.title: Installing Transmission (remote and CLI) client on Raspberry Pi
item.description: This tutorial will explain you how to install Transmission client on Raspberry Pi running Raspbian.
